summary: Completed comprehensive testing of theme and branding customization functionality. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend branding displays correctly on login and dashboard pages. Settings page access has authentication session issues preventing full UI testing.

integration_issues.issue: Authentication session expires when accessing settings page directly or after navigation

design_issues.issue: Logo URL from settings not displaying on login and sidebar (placeholder URL used in tests)

passed_tests: Public settings API returns branding data correctly
Admin login and settings API access working
Branding settings update via API (company name, tagline, colors, theme mode)
Accent color changes via API with multiple color presets
Login page displays custom company name and tagline
Login page shows custom accent color on buttons
Dashboard sidebar displays custom company name and tagline
Light theme mode applied correctly in UI
Red accent color (#ef4444) visible in UI elements
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication session management for Settings page access. The settings page redirects to login when accessed directly or after navigation, preventing testing of the Branding tab UI. All backend APIs are working perfectly, but frontend navigation to settings needs session persistence fix.
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (22/22 tests passed), Frontend: 80% (8/10 core features working)
